issue.title: Add tools to leaflet map
issue.body:
**Original author :** Portier Thomas

3 tools can be added to the leaflet map : 
- locate control that adds a button to locate the user on the map
- fullscreen that adds a button to fullscreen the map
- geocoder ban that add a tool that permit the user to find a place based on the french BAN API

**Fixed versions :** 4.5.1
